subject: Football (College)
World War II (1939-45)
lead_paragraph: The Victory Bell, first sounded on campus by President Harry S. Truman in 1946, is rung by seniors, hoisted by underclassmen, after Rams victories.
snippet: The Victory Bell, first sounded on campus by President Harry S. Truman in 1946, is rung by seniors, hoisted by underclassmen, after Rams victories.
